document.full_text: samuel l. jackson will play the rev. dr. martin luther king jr. in katori hall's olivier award-winning play, but halle berry will not appear in the production, producers said, because of "child custody issues."
document.title: 'the mountaintop' will come to broadway, with jackson but without berry
